thread.title: CONFIRMED: Agyemang-Badu confirmed as Black Stars captain for Canada friendly
thread.title_full: CONFIRMED: Agyemang-Badu confirmed as Black Stars captain for Canada friendly

title: CONFIRMED: Agyemang-Badu confirmed as Black Stars captain for Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 19:40 CET CONFIRMED: Agyemang-Badu confirmed as Black Stars captain for Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Emmanuel Agyemang-Badu will lead Ghana against Canada 
Udinese star Emmanuel Agyemang-Badu has been confirmed as the captain for the Black Stars in Tuesday’s international friendly with Canada in Washington, GHANAsoccernet.com had revealed earlier on Saturday morning. 
The ball-battling midfielder returns to the squad after missing September’s 1-0 win over Rwanda in the 2017 AFCON qualifier and has been handed the armband due to the unavailability of substantive captain Asamoah Gyan and vice Andre Ayew who are both missing the game with injuries. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
